Hey zeke I have completed my attack but I need you to do me a favor

Its armor survived but its internals are wrecked.

I did turn on the engine to only remaining engine to see if it still had any fuel lines attached and as you can see it doesn't

The other engines are the missiles

would you consider this dead?

Let me know so I can finish my move

Its armor survived but its internals are wrecked.

According to the rules...

4- A ship is considered dead when the original 'core' of the ship is incapable of fulfilling two of these three goals unaided from other ships or onboard weapons...

+Sustaining power

+Moving

+Firing weapons.

So if she's got weapons and still has power, she's not dead (just dead in the water)

Not to mention i already think I can get her up and running again (it will take some skill though )

According to the rules...

Ok but if its dead in the water should it be ruled as dead?

Ok but if its dead in the water should it be ruled as dead?

not unless I can get her running again... and no, it's not in the rules so it's not dead. Like ships at sea; they might not move but they're still afloat.

not unless I can get her running again... and no, it's not in the rules so it's not dead. Like ships at sea; they might not move but they're still afloat.

Ok then I ll just say she is alive but is a wreck.

Thanks

Anyone else find this image hilarious?

Anyone else find this image hilarious?

If I wasn't the one fight zeke at the moment, or so upset at all the bugs I got going on I would have

~BATTLE REPORT~

PGS VoD's moment of death...

The aftermath

The "VoD"- with no cockpit or engines, she's dead.

HMS Tod- Undamaged, Three Kills

HMS Darmler- "Killed," but has docking ports; was towed back to base.

HMS Enthauptang- Reattached rear missiles into emergency power configuration, rough calculation of D/V (if all the fuel was continuously transfered to the engines) puts us at 1600 m/s, which should be enough to limp back to a friendly station. One Kill.

HMS Metzger- Lost. A memorial service was held on Eeloo.

Never forget the kerbal lives lost in this conflict -

Operation White as Snow was a failure; Drekevaks managed to defend Eeloo from the invading force, and come away with a clear numerical advantage.

~BATTLE REPORT~

PGS VoD's moment of death...

HMS Metzger- Lost. A memorial service was held on Eeloo.

Never forget the kerbal lives lost in this conflict -

Operation White as Snow was a failure; Drekevaks managed to defend Eeloo from the invading force, and come away with a clear numerical advantage.
